text.data: Chapter 11 Leviathan[end]
Who is it..?[end1]
Is there somebody there...?[end1]
A Holy Dragon...?![end1]
This is...[end1]
Water...?[end1]
Is this water...?![end1]
Donfan: Ahh! Somebody! Help me!![end]

Bikkebakke: Oh no! I caught on to him!
I can't pull him in!!
I can't pull him in!![end]
Donfan: Oh...... thanks for saving me.[end]

Lukia: Donfaaan! Why you little... You snuck into our room, didn't you!
And you even stole [character][0x1]'s...![end]
Oh no, what should I do... What shall I do... This is the biggest crisis of my life...[end]
Donfan: Ah, good morning, Lukia! Nice morning, isn't it? That's because... you shine like the morning sun.[end]

Lukia: You had [character][0x1] drink some Sweet Wine...
[0x24]Your eyes sparkle like the reflection of the night sky on the lake of Mahal.
I shall show you the dragon's underground lake...[0x22]
You said something like that, and then afterwards...!![end]
Lukia is cute. I'm in love. Don't say that in front of everybody!![end]
Donfan: Lukia... I know how you feel so much that it pains me.[end]
That I fell in love with Princess [character][0x1] of Kahna... It was not by accident. It was the destiny of a man and woman.[end]

Destiny to fall in love... Decided from the moment we were born...
Donfan and [character][0x1]...
Those names sound right together...[end]

That is why, Lukia... Please don't be sad. The man of your destiny shall certainly appear someday. Such is the way of the world...
What do you think about Bikkebakke? What about [character][0x0]?[end]

Gunso: [0x2a]scratch[0x2a] [0x2a]scratch[0x2a] The beds in my town are so nice...
I don't want to [0x2a]scratch[0x2a] [0x2a]scratch[0x2a] return to [character][0x9]...[end]
You got Gunso's ???.[end]
You got a Bastard Sword and Aurora that the octopus spit out.[end]

Sendak: Achoo! I think I still have a cold...
The Princess's dream... Her dream about Leviathan... I hear Leviathan is in an underground lake near this village. An underground lake nobody has ever entered... I am... scared. I am running a fever as well... We are going to meet Matelite, Taicho, and the others there. It seems Taicho is really busy with Mahal's revival. Matelite went into business selling his autographed armor... The princess is with him too...[end]
Wait... take care, Sendak! Let's go... don't overdo it, Sendak![end1]
Sendak: Achoo! Should we go to the underground lake?[end]
Bikkebakke: Having nothing but mushrooms is bad for the body... So I'm fishing for an octopus! Why don't you give it a try, [character][0x0]?[end]
I'll give it a shot. You keep at it.[end1]
Eh?! Then we'll have poison mushrooms today, yet again...!! If we wanna buy a house we'll have to tough it out![end]
Bikkebakke: [character][0x0]! How about some mushrooms?[end]
I want some. I don't need any.[end1]
Lukia: Doooonfaaan....[end]
Battlefield Salesman: Hello! I am a loving salesman...[end]
Weapons, please. Armor, please. Items, please.[end1]
You got 2 of Gunso's Battle Strategy Books and a Prodigy Notebook.[end]
You got 3 Sweet Wines and 2 Super Vodkas that Lukia didn't finish.[end]
You got 3 of Lukia's Drawer Things.[end]
You got 6 of Gunso's Drawer Things.[end]
You got a Nimbus Robe.[end]
You got a Guardian.[end]
You got 6 Earth Grasses.[end]
You got 5 Sweet Wines.[end]
Bikkebakke: [character][0x0], you can fish next to me. If you catch one, move the octopus using left, down, and right. If he fights back, reel it in using A![end]
Bikkebakke: You got him! Now don't let him go![end]
Reel him in with the A button![end]
Looks tasty![end]
Oh, so close. Try again![end][end]
